channel.title: +कथाः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +कथाः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: agni-stambhanam
item.description: vasordhArA homa Provenance: First hand account My personal experience is seeing my SV guru (MLN) calm down a raging fire of 30 feet height that came out of a vasordhara homa just by showing his palm. - Vijay B

item.title: Physical deformity
item.description: Horse face Provenance: Second hand account My 10th grade Math teacher knew a Hayagriva Upasaka of 30+ years. Apparently his face underwent some mutation and got elongates slightly but clearly horselike. - Vijay B
